name: process_constructions_finished_basement

arguments.name: selectedfbsmt
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the finished basement

arguments.name: selectedfbsmtins
arguments.display_name: Finished basement insulation type

arguments.name: selectedstudsize
arguments.display_name: Wood stud size of wall cavity

arguments.name: selectedspacing
arguments.display_name: Wood stud spacing of wall cavity

arguments.name: selectedfbsmtwallcav
arguments.display_name: Finished basement whole wall cavity insulationFor manually entering finished basement whole wall cavity insulation properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedfbsmtwallcavr
arguments.display_name: Finished basement whole wall cavity insulation R-value

arguments.name: selectedinstallgrade
arguments.display_name: Insulation installation grade of wood stud wall cavity

arguments.name: selectedinsfills
arguments.display_name: Cavity insulation fills the cavity

arguments.name: selectedfbsmtwallcont
arguments.display_name: Finished basement wall continuous insulationFor manually entering finished basement wall continuous insulation properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedfbsmtwallcontth
arguments.display_name: Finished basement wall continuous insulation thickness

arguments.name: userdefinedfbsmtwallcontr
arguments.display_name: Finished basement wall continuous insulation R-value

arguments.name: selectedfbsmtceiljoistheight
arguments.display_name: Finished basement ceiling joist height

arguments.name: selectedfbsmtceilff
arguments.display_name: Finished basement ceiling framing factor

arguments.name: selectedfbsmtrimjoist
arguments.display_name: Finished basement rim joist insulationFor manually entering finished basement rim joist insulation properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedfbsmtrimjoistr
arguments.display_name: Finished basement rim joist insulation R-value

arguments.name: selectedgypsum
arguments.display_name: Interior finish  of wall cavityFor manually entering interior finish properties of wall cavity, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedgypthickness
arguments.display_name: Thickness of drywall layers

arguments.name: userdefinedgyplayers
arguments.display_name: Number of drywall layers

arguments.name: selectedfloormass
arguments.display_name: Floor massFor manually entering floor mass properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedfloormassth
arguments.display_name: Floor mass thickness

arguments.name: userdefinedfloormasscond
arguments.display_name: Floor mass conductivity

arguments.name: userdefinedfloormassdens
arguments.display_name: Floor mass density

arguments.name: userdefinedfloormasssh
arguments.display_name: Floor mass specific heat

arguments.name: selectedcarpet
arguments.display_name: CarpetFor manually entering carpet properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedcarpetr
arguments.display_name: Carpet pad R-value

arguments.name: userdefinedcarpetfrac
arguments.display_name: Carpet floor fraction

modeler_description: Calculates material layer properties of constructions for the finished basement walls, floor, and rim joists. Finds surfaces adjacent to the finished basement and sets applicable constructions.
description: This measure creates constructions for the finished basement walls, floor, and rim joists.
